service_definition_overrides.Configurations/SVCConfiguration/Definiti: Perennial Water generated over the Hindu Kush Himalayan (HKH) region, processed by ASF.
Perennial Water generated over the Hindu Kush Himalayan (HKH) region, processed by ASF. Pixel values of 1 indicate surface water, NoData is used for non-water pixels.
Watermap Extent products processed by ASF DAAC HyP3.
service_definition_overrides.ItemInfo/Credits: Perennial Water products processed by ASF DAAC HyP3.
